inlineImageAndParagraph.text: Phonetic Name Matching is a critical component of Decentro's Farsight Data Forensics, enabling businesses to compare and match names based on their sound rather than exact spelling. This capability is vital for enhancing identity verification, bolstering fraud detection, and ensuring compliance during customer onboarding and ongoing monitoring processes.

items.description: Utilise industry-standard algorithms like Soundex, Metaphone, and Double Metaphone to precisely identify phonetic similarities across diverse name datasets.
Effectively match names despite common misspellings, alternate spellings, nicknames, and complex transliteration differences, ensuring comprehensive coverage.
Define the strictness of the match with adjustable thresholds, providing flexibility for various use cases and aligning with specific risk appetites.
